name: Cloud Guardian, Miniature , Paper clay , Home decorative, OOAK
description:
'The Cloud Guardian ' - Wishing Bells Series


Oh dear ~ Oh dear roses have gone all pale....
Haven't my pet clouds bring shower well ...? 



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cloud Guardian ,a 'Wishing Bell' in the size of 4cm tall, is made out of environmental friendly materials consisting of paper clay and wires. This charming figurine is hand painted with acrylics which then sealed with high quality satin finish giving it a semi glossy look. 


" I might be tiny & adorable but i'm not a toy.Please be gentle with me *o* " - Note from the Cloud Guardian
